function renderLine(line,pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c=strsub(pattern,i,i)
if c=="#" then set_stone("st-plain",i-1,line) elseif c=="." then set_floor("fl-metal",i-1,line) elseif c=="X" then oxyd(i-1,line)
elseif c=="0" then set_stone("st-fourswitch",i-1,line,{action="open",target="d0"}) elseif c=="1" then set_stone("st-fourswitch",i-1,line,{action="open",target="d1"}) elseif c=="2" then set_stone("st-fourswitch",i-1,line,{action="open",target="d2"}) elseif c=="3" then set_stone("st-fourswitch",i-1,line,{action="open",target="d3"}) elseif c=="4" then set_stone("st-fourswitch",i-1,line,{action="open",target="d4"}) elseif c=="5" then set_stone("st-fourswitch",i-1,line,{action="open",target="d5"}) elseif c=="F" then set_stone("st-fourswitch",i-1,line)
elseif c=="O" then set_item("it-vortex-open",i-1,line,{name="15B",targetx=17.5,targety=2.5}) set_floor("fl-metal",i-1,line) elseif c=="o" then set_item("it-vortex-open",i-1,line,{name="18C",targetx=14.5,targety=1.5}) set_floor("fl-metal",i-1,line) elseif c=="Q" then set_item("it-vortex-open",i-1,line,{targetx=1.5,targety=11.5}) set_floor("fl-metal",i-1,line) elseif c=="q" then set_item("it-vortex-open",i-1,line,{targetx=10.5,targety=7.5}) set_stone("st-door_a",i-1,line,{name="blocker"}) set_floor("fl-metal",i-1,line)
elseif c=="v" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=1}) elseif c=="^" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=2}) elseif c==">" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=3}) elseif c=="<" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=4}) elseif c=="l" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=5}) elseif c=="L" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=7}) elseif c=="r" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=6}) elseif c=="R" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=8}) elseif c=="a" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=9}) elseif c=="b" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=10}) elseif c=="c" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=11}) elseif c=="d" then set_floor("fl-gradient1",i-1,line,{type=12})
elseif c=="D" then set_stone("st-door-v",i-1,line,{name="d"..tostring(5-doorcounter)}) doorcounter = doorcounter + 1 if (not difficult) then set_floor("fl-abyss",i-1,line, {friction=0} ) else set_floor("fl-abyss",i-1,line, {friction=0.1} ) end
elseif c=="x" then set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="open",target="blocker"})
elseif c=="-" then if (not difficult) then set_floor("fl-abyss",i-1,line, {friction=0}) else set_floor("fl-abyss",i-1,line, {friction=0.1}) end end end end
